content: A medical student with a passion in neuroscience, AI,  and technology. Aiming to leverage tech skills to solve challenges in the medical field

skills: Basic Web development — HTML, CSS, Javascript

content.company: vidyasirimedhi institute of science and technology (VISTEC)
responsibilities: Perform signal processing on IMU signals which includes noise filtering and feature extraction
Develop Ramdom Forest model which recognize walk activity of the elderly

content.title: Scalable Open-vocabulary Imagined Speech BCI System
content.description: Led the team and design system to recognize imagined speech which aimed to solve low accuracy problem in previous ML works and is intended to help people with speech loss. This project won the first place in the ALS track (business problem statement by SCG WEDO) of Brain Hackathon 2024

content.title: A Cloud solution for personalized object recognition
content.description: Built an Azure cloud solution that enables blind and visually-impaired individuals to teach and recognize personal items, which are typically beyond the capabilities of general object recognition models. This project was selected for presentation in the final round of Microsoft Thailand's AI for Accessibility Hackathon 2024.

content.title: Graph Theoretical Analysis on Multi-order Functional Brain Network of ADHD
content.description: Analyzed the functional brain network from fMRI signals of ADHD patients using graph theory and machine learning. This project was presented and won third place in Brain Code Camp poster presentations.

content.title: CNN for classifying migraine from EEG signals
content.description: Built a CNN model to classify migraine from EEG signals. This project was a capstone prohect for graduation from AI Builders program by VISTEC/VISAI & Central Retail Digital

content.title: Nexus: a knowledge management app dedicated for learning insights from graph
content.description: Built a mobile app to store knowledge on graph and gain insights from graoh metrics by using React Native.

content.title: Daily Brainy
content.description: Built an automated system that edits and posts short videos about neuroscience daily on social media using Python which have about 2000 followers on Instagram

content: Actively write blog posts and social media posts (TikTok, Instagram) viewed by over 20K+ job seekers per week to help people with best practices to land their dream jobs.

Admin for the FAANGPath Discord community with over 6000+ job seekers and industry mentors. Actively involved in facilitating online events, career conversations, and more alongside other admins and a team of volunteer moderators!
